notes.p: Safaa Moneer is currently working as a teaching assistant in the Biomedical Engineering Department, Faculty of Engineering, Helwan University, Egypt. Her main research interests are signal processing, bioinformatics and programing.

Mai S. Mabrouk is currently a professor of and department head of biomedical engineering at the Misr University for Science and Technology. She published over 70 peer-reviewed articles in the area of biomedical engineering.
Samir Y. Marzouk is working as a professor of basic sciences at AASTMT, Egypt. He had authored many research papers in reputed international and national journals.
Mohamed Eldosoky has completed his PhD in biomedical engineering from Helwan University, Egypt, in 2005. He has more than 80 papers in international journals and conferences.
